price: 20 Moïse se justifia : « Au moment où je l’ai commis, j’étais encore ignorant.
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
